name: Runbots by Mediaflex Games for Free
name_original: Runbots by Mediaflex Games for Free
description:
Run, little robot, run as fast as you can!

Meet Runbot. Created with the sole purpose of running, jumping and gliding further than any other robot.

Take on loads of fun levels and run your way to victory!


JUST SOME OF THE FEATURES:


>> MAKE RUNBOT YOURS

Take a selfie and Runbot will suddenly and magically look just like you! Why would you want to do this I hear you ask? BECAUSE YOU CAN.


>> BUILD YOUR TEAM

Recruit friends to your team and they SHOW UP IN YOUR GAME! Play as them to run further.
Now you can finally BE that person you're obsessed with. Then get them blown up with a rocket!


>> UNLOCK OTHER ROBOTS

Play as loads of other bots inspired by icons of pop culture.
